column1: martha-lia shuman| martha-lia shuman. born: may 29
column7: age 60 of port deposit passed away. she was the cherished daughter of jose maria tena blanca and alicia de tena; beloved wife of sterling shuman; devoted mother of troy shuman and christa shuman; and caring sister of jose maria tena villada
column10: and luis carlos tena villada. also survived by a large host of family and friends both local and abroad. family and friends will honor martha-lias life at the family owned evans funeral chapel & cremation services bel air
column11: 3 newport dr. (rts 23 & 24 forest hill) on tuesday
column14: with a memorial service beginning at that time. in lieu of flowers
column15: donations may be made in martha-lias name to either: university of maryland
column16: st. joseph medical center cancer institute
column19: md 21204 or the american cancer society
